text: Richard H. Thaler (; born September 12, 1945) is an American economist of Jewish descent.www.jinfo.org He is best known for being a theorist in behavioral finance. He was awarded the 2017 Nobel Prize in Economics for improving behavioral economics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:American Nobel Prize winners Category:Jewish American academics Category:Jewish American scientists Category:Jewish Nobel Prize winners Category:People from East Orange, New Jersey Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:University of Rochester alumni Category:Educators from New Jersey
title: Richard Thaler
